name: mongering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of encouraging a particular activity, especially one that causes trouble: They accused him of rumour-mongering/scandal-mongering. Fear-mongering often takes the place of thoughtful and objective analysis. See
-mongerSee also
scaremongering
More examplesFewer examplesIt was easy for any relatively rational person to dismiss the media doom-mongering.He is a war-mongering corrupt dictator.Social media smear-mongering has debased the democratic process.She accused some of the tabloids of racist hate-mongering.
